ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.title: III - Mars Attacks![--III - 火星攻击!--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests0.descript: The &bRunic Altar&r is one of the first blocks crafted with the Miniaturization Crafting. Consult JEI on how to place the blocks and toss a Mana Diamond to initiate the craft.[--&b符文祭坛&r是第一个用微型合成制作的方块之一。请就如何放置方块和扔下魔力钻石来启动合成。--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests1.descript: Combining Elementalcraft Runes with an Ars Nouveau Element, some Manasteel and Manapowder will result into Botania Runes[--将元素工艺符文与新生魔艺元素结合,一些魔钢和魔力粉将生成植物魔法符文--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests8.descript: salt into a chemical oxidizer gives you gaseous brine. Put that into a rotary condenstrator to make Brine (Liquid). [--将盐变成化学氧化剂,会给你气态盐水。放入旋转冷凝器中制作盐水(液态)。--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests9.descript: Liquid Brine goes into an electrolytic seperator to give you sodium and chlorine gas. [--液态盐水进入电解静音器,会给你钠和氯气.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests10.descrip: Combine silicon, Chlorine Gas and Polyethylene in a Pressurized Reaction Chamber to make printed silicon, the basis of all advanced circuits. You'll definitely want this process automated.[--在加压反应室中将硅、氯气和聚乙烯结合,以制作所有的高级电路基件(即纸质硅).你绝对需要这个自动化过程.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests16.descrip: &eLaserIO&r intelligently teleports items between inventories, without needing to have a path of pipes.[--&eLaserIO&r在物品栏之间智能传送物品,不需要有管道通道.--]
The mod has a very good &ePatchouli&r book, which I suggest you read.[--mod有一个非常不错的&ePatchouli&r书,我建议你阅读.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests25.subtitl: Let it grow, let it grow![--让它生长,让它生长!--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests25.descrip: Crafting a &6Manasteel Mesh&r will make you more noticeable to magic users of the world![--制作一个&6魔钢筛网&r可以让你更看重世界的魔法使用者!--]
Amethyst can be looted or traded from piglins. They can then be infused with elemental water magic to create springaline. [--紫水晶可以被猪灵抢夺或交易。然后它们可以灌注元素水魔法来制造春素。--]
&6Amethyst Golems&r are very useful for farming and creating additional amethyt, check out the quest for them in the Ars Nouveau chapter![--&6紫晶傀儡&r对耕种和创造额外的紫水晶很有用,查看新生秘典章节中他们的任务!--]

You'll then need to make your way to the moon to gather some Desh ore. By alloying the Springaline with Desh you can create a magically stable metal that and refine even more resources from mundane items.[--然后,你需要前往月球收集一些戴斯泰斯矿石。通过将斯普林亚灵与戴斯铁合金,你可以制作一个神奇稳定的金属,从普通物品中提炼更多的资源。--]
